definition: to feel intimidated
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
to fear
intimidate at the first glance (idiom); awe-inspiring/terrifying/overwhelming

sentences.english: Perhaps it was this peculiarity that invested him with a species of ghastliness and awe.
sentences.chinese: 也许正是这个特点才使他令人望而生畏。

sentences.english: The task ahead of us was daunting.
sentences.chinese: 令人生畏的任务摆在我们面前。

sentences.english: He's a crusty old gentleman who feeds stray dogs and cats.
sentences.chinese: 他是个令人生畏的老绅士，常喂食离群的狗和猫。

sentences.english: The dynamic duo to which he refers is the fearsome partnership of Rio Ferdinand and Nemanja Vidic.
sentences.chinese: 这对搭档就是令人生畏的费迪南德和维迪奇。

sentences.english: Downplay the scary, chilling, creepy, parts of Halloween.
sentences.chinese: 淡化万圣节那可怕，令人胆寒生畏的部分。

sentences.english: At first, mock objects can seem quite daunting.
sentences.chinese: 一开始，模拟对象看上去令人生畏。

sentences.english: That is a daunting enough statistic.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个让人望而生畏的数据。

sentences.english: "If I was doing it myself it would be rather daunting, " she said.
sentences.chinese: 她说，“如果是我一个人来做，那可能会让我生畏。

sentences.english: The house looked dark and forbidding .
sentences.chinese: 房子黑森森的，令人望而生畏。

sentences.english: Volcanoes are awesome manifestations of the fiery power contained deep within the Earth.
sentences.chinese: 火山爆发是蕴藏地球深部炙热能量令人生畏的宣泄。

sentences.english: Reportedly, the two door god affixed to the door, and all Jiaomoguiguai will be daunting.
sentences.chinese: 据说，大门上贴上两位门神，一切魔怪都会望而生畏。

sentences.english: It is not only Meyer's heroine who found Volterra daunting.
sentences.chinese: 不仅仅是梅尔的女主角发现了沃尔泰拉的令人生畏。

sentences.english: This looks intimidating, but it's really not bad at all.
sentences.chinese: 这看起来有点令人望而生畏，但确实一点都不难。

sentences.english: A daunting summit is nothing more than a challenge.
sentences.chinese: 一座令人生畏的高山不过就是一次挑战而已。

sentences.english: The time-dependent Schroedinger equation is rather formidable looking.
sentences.chinese: 含时间的薛定谔方程似乎是令人生畏的。

sentences.english: Monumentality always suggests supreme power and that's scary.
sentences.chinese: 雄伟总是能暗示一种至高权力，令人生畏。

definition: intimidate at the first glance (idiom); awe-inspiring/terrifying/overwhelming
to fear/to be terrified
to step back
shiver all over though not cold/tremble with fear/shudder
to tremble with fear (idiom)/scared witless
hear the wind and lose gall (idiom); terror-stricken at the news
panic-stricken
see 心驚膽戰|心惊胆战[xin1 jing1 dan3 zhan4]
to tremble with fear
lit. heart alarmed, trembling in fear (idiom); prostrate with fear/scared witless
to feel terrified/to grow apprehensive
to turn pale at the mention of a tiger (idiom)/to be scared at the mere mention of
lit. to retreat three day's march (idiom); fig. to give way in the face of superior strength/a strategic withdrawal
to feel respect
convinced/to admire from the heart/enchanted
variant of 發怵|发怵[fa1 chu4]
